[Beast Trainer](/Feats.aspx?ID=4512) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

You have an impressive innate ability to tame and command ferocious beasts. You become trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill and gain your choice of the [Pet](/Feats.aspx?ID=5186) general feat or the [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) skill feat.
